source.name: Property Owners and Managers Survey - Single Family Microdata
source.description: The Property Owners and Managers Survey (POMS) Overview, Summary Tables, and Source and Accuracy Statement are available from the U.S. Census Bureau. POMS was designed to gain a better understanding of the property owners and managers on whom the nation depends to provide affordable rental housing, and of what motivates and shapes their rental and maintenance policies. This dataset contains the single family macrodata.
